note:
I am a high school English and history teacher (college level World History class for a local uni - a history of Brit Empire, tbh). Model UN adviser.

Never finished my PhD (Medieval history) - loved teaching teens and the birth of my first child made writing that dissertation just too challenging @ the time).

Mother of OC Irish dancer (Mid America Region)

In love with Irish history, but all history excites me.

An Ulster Scots American who is passionate about Irish unity - Free Scotland!
